TextView.android:text: Private and Confidential
Dear \n\n
Re: Representation at (POLICE STATION -
) on (DATE -

We write further to our attendance outlined above, when following the interview, under caution, it was
concluded that no further action would be taken against you. I trust that you were satisfied with the
representation you received, and also with this conclusion. We would appreciate it if you could take
the time to complete the enclosed client satisfaction questionnaire and return this to us as soon as
possible.
\nIf you need any further assistance in the future please do not hesitate in contacting us on
\nYours sincerely
\nOne Legal
\nCLIENT SATISFACTION SURVEY
\nYour opinions are very important to us in order to help us continually improve the service we provide.
\nWe would be grateful if you could complete this form and return it to us.

Please be assured that the survey is completely confidential and can be completed anonymously. If
you do wish to give your name or you would like us to contact you to discuss any of the issues raised,
please complete section 17 below.
How would you rate how easy it is to access our\nservices?
How would you rate how easy it is to access our\nservices?
If you visited our offices, how would you rate the\nway you were greeted by us?
How would you rate the approachability and\nfriendliness of your adviser?
How would you rate the level of confidence you\nhad in your adviser to act in your best interests?
How would you rate our understanding of and\nour commitment to your matter?
In terms of progress, how well did we\ncommunicate with you whether by telephone,\nletter, e-mail or face-to-face?
How well did we explain things to you?
How would you rate your ability to easily contact\nus regarding your matter on a day-to-day basis?
How well did your adviser listen to what you had\nto say?
In terms of the time taken by us to progress your\nmatter, how would you rate our service to you?
How would you rate our overall service to you?
If you answered 'Poor' or Very poor' to any question, or have any suggestions for how we\ncould improve our service, please comment here:
Are there any additional comments you would like to make?
How would you rate how easy it is to access our\nservices?
How likely is it that you would\nrecommend this firm to others?
How likely is it that you would use our\nfirm again?
How did you hear about us?
Thank you for completing this form.
17 This form can be completed anonymously but if you do wish to give your name or you\n would like us to contact you to discuss any of the issues raised, please complete this\n section:
Name:
Contact details:
Matter reference:
